description: The program looks like what I want but after installing, I cannot find it anywhere on my machine.

I went from a simple asm file to a fully compiled .tap image in one simple line
file helloworld.z80asm.asm:
org	0x8000

ld	hl,	Message
call	PrintString

ld	b, 	100
;delay	halt
ret

PrintChar:
	push	hl
	push	bc
	push	de
	push	af
	ld	a,	2
	call	0x1601
	pop	af
	push	af
	rst	16
	pop	af
	pop	de
	pop	bc
	pop	hl
	ret

PrintString:
	ld	a,	(hl)
	cp	255
	ret	z
	inc	hl
	call	PrintChar
	jr	PrintString

Message:	defb	"Hello World", 255
	

$ z88dk.z88dk-z80asm -v -ohelloworld +zx helloworld.z80asm.asm
Assembling 'helloworld.z80asm.asm' to 'helloworld.z80asm.o'
Reading 'helloworld.z80asm.asm' = 'helloworld.z80asm.asm'
Writing object file 'helloworld.z80asm.o'
Module 'helloworld.z80asm' size: 48 bytes

Code size: 48 bytes ($5CD0 to $5CFF)
Creating binary 'helloworld'
z88dk-appmake +zx -b "helloworld.z80asm.bin" -o "helloworld.z80asm.tap" --org 23760
